articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: NASA still hopes to launch moon mission in June despite two scrubbed trials - CNN
articles.description: The second wet dress rehearsal of NASA's Artemis I mission to the moon was scrubbed Monday after a problem with a panel. The problem was not major, officials say, and they still hope to launch in June the mission that will eventually return humans to the moon.
